last_episode_to_air.name: Space Chase
last_episode_to_air.overview: A scientist sends Tom and Jerry into space to determine if natural enemies can peacefully coexist.

name: Tom & Jerry Kids Show
overview: Tom and Jerry in their childhood days, playing cat-and-mouse games even then.

episodes.name: Flippin' Fido
episodes.overview: Tom searches for Jerry inside a department store and encounters a Frisbee-loving watchdog.

episodes.name: Dakota Droopy & the Lost Dutch Boy Mine
episodes.overview: Droopy outwits McWolf.

episodes.name: Dog Daze Afternoon
episodes.overview: Tom teams up with the dogcatcher to eliminate Jerry's protector Spike.

episodes.name: Toys Will Be Toys
episodes.overview: Tom battles a snoring Jerry when they're locked inside a toy store.

episodes.name: Droopy Delivers
episodes.overview: Droopy delivers pizza, but McWolf is after his business.

episodes.name: My Pal
episodes.overview: A dumb cat helps Tom catch Jerry.

episodes.name: Prehistoric Pals
episodes.overview: Jerry and a baby dinosaur join forces.

episodes.name: Super Droop & Dripple Boy Meet the Yolker
episodes.overview: Super Droop & Dripple Boy meet the Yolker and thwart the villain's crime spree.

episodes.name: Marvelous Marvin
episodes.overview: Marvelous Marvin plots revenge when Tom usurps his job as a cat-food spokeskitty.

episodes.name: Bat Mouse
episodes.overview: Jerry confronts Tom after donning a mail order Batmouse costume which is supposed to make him invincible.

episodes.name: Puss n' Pups
episodes.overview: Spike tries to teach Tyke to chase cats.

episodes.name: Outer Space Rover
episodes.overview: Tom chases an intergalactic dog accidentally left behind by his spaceship.

episodes.name: The Vermin
episodes.overview: Jerry keeps Tom awake playing the guitar he won while watching his favorite rock group.

episodes.name: Aerobic Droopy
episodes.overview: McWolf steals a customer from Droopy's gym.

episodes.name: Mouse Scouts
episodes.overview: Tom hampers Jerry's excursion with the mouse scouts.

episodes.name: Sugar Belle Loves Tom, Sometimes
episodes.overview: Tom protects a lavish dinner table from Jerry while flirting with a beautiful kitten.

episodes.name: Super Duper Spike
episodes.overview: Spike becomes Super-Duper Spike when he masquerades as Tyke's favorite TV hero.

episodes.name: Mall Mouse
episodes.overview: Tom attempts to keep the Mall Mouse from attacking a cheese shop.

episodes.name: Cosmic Chaos
episodes.overview: Security cat Tom tries to stop Jerry from creating havoc at an apartment complex.

episodes.name: Droopy of the Opera
episodes.overview: McWolf seeks revenge when the great tenor Droopy replaces him.

episodes.name: Beach Bummers
episodes.overview: A friendly dolphin helps Jerry save Tom from a shark.

episodes.name: Gator Baiter
episodes.overview: Jerry helps an alligator who has been forced to become a wrestler.

episodes.name: Hoodwinked Cat
episodes.overview: Tyke confronts a hungry feline while delivering a canary to his grandmother's house.

episodes.name: Medieval Mouse
episodes.overview: Tom must rid the Medieval castle of Jerry.

episodes.name: Clyde to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Clyde and Tom try to catch Jerry on a golf course.

episodes.name: Droopio & Juliet
episodes.overview: The evil McWolfulet tries to thwart the love between Droopio And Juliet.

episodes.name: Maze Monster Zap Men
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry become stuck in a video gaze and confront the treacherous Maze Monster Zap-Men.

episodes.name: Crash Condor
episodes.overview: Jerry protects a baby bird from becoming Tom's next meal.

episodes.name: Yo Ho Ho... Bub
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple search for buried treasure.

episodes.name: Scrub-a-Dub Tom
episodes.overview: A beautified and ribboned Tom attracts the unwelcome attention of some tough alley cats.

episodes.name: No Biz Like Snow Biz
episodes.overview: Tom tries to ruin a Mouse Scout outing at a ski resort.

episodes.name: The Maltese Poodle
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry search for the Maltese Poodle in a parody of the Bogart classic.

episodes.name: Cast Away Tom
episodes.overview: Castaway Tom finds his problems have just begun when he finds land.

episodes.name: The Little Urfulls
episodes.overview: When Urfo leaves the little Urfulls in Jerry's care, they're captured by a dogcatcher.

episodes.name: Droopo: First Bloodhound
episodes.overview: McWolf escapes from jail and swears revenge.

episodes.name: Indy Mouse 500
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry compete in a high-speed race.

episodes.name: Exterminator Cometh
episodes.overview: Calaboose Cal is hired by Tom's owner who will replace Tom if he can't capture Jerry.

episodes.name: Foreign Legion Frenzy
episodes.overview: Out in a desert, McWolf attacks Droopy and Dripple's castle.

episodes.name: Urfo Returns
episodes.overview: Urfo flies away from home as he escapes. He rescues and defends Jerry from pursuing Tom; Meanwhile a robotic catcher hires Tom as his reluctant assistant as both of them must work together to catch Urfo and get a huge money reward.

episodes.name: Circus Antics
episodes.overview: An elephant gives Jerry a whistle at a circus in case he needs assistance when Tom is pursuing him.

episodes.name: Tr√©s Sheik Poodles
episodes.overview: Fido is confused if he is a dog or cat when he keeps getting hit on the head with various objects. Tom and Jerry try to persuade him in opposite directions.

episodes.name: Head Banger Buddy
episodes.overview: Tom buys a motivational exercise training cassette to attempt to get in as good as shape as Jerry.

episodes.name: Pump 'Em Up Pals
episodes.overview: Tom buys a motivational exercise training cassette to attempt to get in as good as shape as Jerry.

episodes.name: Droopyland
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple start an amusement park next to Mighty McWolf's amusement park.

episodes.name: The Exterminator Cometh... Again
episodes.overview: Calaboose Cal returns and has a late night television program with Tom and Jerry as guests.

episodes.name: Jerry's Mother
episodes.overview: Jerry's Mother comes home to visit Jerry.

episodes.name: Stage Fright
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple compete with McWolf for Miss Vavoom's attention and her performance at their saloons.

episodes.name: Tom's Terror
episodes.overview: Tom answers an advertisement for an old lady seeking a travel companion but everything is not what it seems.

episodes.name: Who Are You Kitten?
episodes.overview: A street urchin disguising in a form of orphan invades the home.

episodes.name: Broadway Droopy
episodes.overview: Droppy competes with McWolf to be Miss Vavoom's co-star in a Broadway musical.

episodes.name: Pussycat Pirate
episodes.overview: Tom becomes Captain Redbeard's trusted deck-hand while he is at a convention.

episodes.name: Father's Day
episodes.overview: Tom's grandfather shows up on Father's Day and tries to teach Tom and Jerry survival skills.

episodes.name: Scourge of the Sky
episodes.overview: Droopy has a mission to get top secret plans to the front lines but McWolf is trying to sabotage him.

episodes.name: Lightning Bolt the Super Squirrel
episodes.overview: Lightning Bolt the Super Squirrel Is Helped by Tom and Jerry

episodes.name: Amademouse
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry compete to become the King's favorite pianist.

episodes.name: Muscle Beach Droopy
episodes.overview: Hunk Hardbody competes for attention at the beach with Droopy and Dripple.

episodes.name: Perky the Fish Pinching Penguin
episodes.overview: Perky the Penguin makes Tom's fishing efforts miserable.

episodes.name: Slowpoke Antonio
episodes.overview: Jerry's cousin, Slowpoke Antonio, is in town for a rodeo and gives Tom fits.

episodes.name: Haunted Droopy
episodes.overview: McWolf tries to cheat Droopy out of his brother's will at a haunted house.

episodes.name: Wild Mouse
episodes.overview: Tom tries to keep Wild Mouse from stealing from a lumberjack.

episodes.name: Catch That Mouse
episodes.overview: Calaboose Cal hosts a game show where Tom and other cats try to catch Jerry.

episodes.name: Good Knight Droopy
episodes.overview: Droopy jousts a knight for the hand of a princess.

episodes.name: Birthday Surprise
episodes.overview: Tom showers Cindy-Lou with birthday gifts but all she wants is Jerry.

episodes.name: Cleocatra
episodes.overview: Tom is a servant of Cleocatra's tasked with catching Jerry in Ancient Egypt.

episodes.name: McWolfenstein
episodes.overview: McWolf creates a Frankenstein-like monster and competes with Droopy for world's greatest scientist.

episodes.name: Chase School
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry are guest participants at a Chase School for cat and mice.

episodes.name: Zorrito
episodes.overview: Tom is a tax collector for a land baron in Spain, when Jerry dressed as Zorrito takes on the people's cause.

episodes.name: Deep Sleep Droopy
episodes.overview: Miss Vavoom hires Droopy and Dripple as private eyes to investigate Chubby McWolf.

episodes.name: Hard to Swallow
episodes.overview: A migrating swallow seeks help from Jerry to avoid Tom's pursuits.

episodes.name: The Little Thinker
episodes.overview: Urfo and Buzz become friends, pull pranks and out run Big Think.

episodes.name: Rap Rat Is Where It's At
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple thwart Rappin' Rat's criminal activity as police officers.

episodes.name: My Pet
episodes.overview: Tyke hides escaped circus tiger, Titan the Terrible, from Spike.

episodes.name: Calaboose Cal 495
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry race in Calaboose Cal's deceptive car race.

episodes.name: Return of the Chubby Man
episodes.overview: Miss Vavoom hires Droopy and Dripple to protect her poodle from Mighty McWolf.

episodes.name: Chumpy Chums
episodes.overview: Spike and Tyke try to teach Tom how to treat Jerry for them to become friends.

episodes.name: Jerry Hood and His Merry Meeces
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry star in a Robin Hood parody.

episodes.name: Eradicator Droopy
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple have to save the city from McWolf and The Eradicator.

episodes.name: Tyke on a Hike
episodes.overview: Spike takes Tyke on a hike and they have to fend off a hungry mountain lion.

episodes.name: The Planet Dogmania
episodes.overview: A late-night snack induces a wild dream for Tom.

episodes.name: McWolfula
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple visit the home of McWolfula, the vampire.

episodes.name: Catawumpus Cat
episodes.overview: Indian Tom tracks the dreaded Wild Mouse to become a catawumpus cat.

episodes.name: Pest in the West
episodes.overview: As an uninvited guest at the Lazy Kat Ranch, Jerry soon becomes the pest in the west.

episodes.name: Double 'O' Droopy
episodes.overview: Secret agent Double 'O' Droopy chases thief McWolf.

episodes.name: Tom, the Babysitter
episodes.overview: Tom the babysitter protects an infant from danger when the regular sitter spends all her time on the phone.

episodes.name: Gas Blaster Puss
episodes.overview: Jerry builds a tiny motorcycle to escape Tom.

episodes.name: Fear of Flying
episodes.overview: Dr. Droopy cures McWolf of his fear of flying.

episodes.name: Mess Hall Mouser
episodes.overview: Jerry creates problems for army Private Tom.

episodes.name: Toliver's Twist
episodes.overview: Wealthy cat Tom learns a lesson when poor Toliver mouse pleads for food and shelter in the Dickensian tale.

episodes.name: Boomer Beaver
episodes.overview: Spike uses too many trees to construct his cabin, leaving Boomer Beaver unable to build a home.

episodes.name: Pony Express Droopy
episodes.overview: Pony Express Droopy outwits the devious McWolf.

episodes.name: Krazy Klaws
episodes.overview: Tom wants to join a gang of biker cats.

episodes.name: Tyke on a Bike
episodes.overview: Tyke wins a bicycle.

episodes.name: Tarmutt of the Apes
episodes.overview: Droopy interferes with McWolf's plans to steal a giant gorilla.

episodes.name: Tom's Mermouse Mess-Up
episodes.overview: When Tom uses Jerry as bait to fish, Jerry meets a pretty sea creature.

episodes.name: Here's Sand in Your Face
episodes.overview: Trouble ensues when a bully confronts Spike at the beach.

episodes.overview: With Dripple's help, deep space Droopy protects a princess from Lord Nebula McWolf.

episodes.name: Termi-Maid
episodes.overview: Trouble follows when Tom and Jerry's owner hires a robot maid.

episodes.name: The Fish That Shoulda Got Away
episodes.overview: Spike takes Tyke fishing.

episodes.name: Droopy's Rhino
episodes.overview: McWolf competes against Droopy and Dripple to capture Droopy's rhino.

episodes.name: The Break 'n' Entry Boyz
episodes.overview: The Break 'N' Entry Boyz terrorize Tom and Jerry's neighborhood.

episodes.name: Love Me, Love My Zebra
episodes.overview: Tyke brings home an unusual pet.

episodes.name: Dakota Droopy Returns
episodes.overview: Dakota Droopy returns to search the Amazon for a lost jungle princess.

episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry confront a witch.

episodes.overview: Spike and Tyke try to get rid of an uninvited dinner guest.

episodes.name: The Fabulous Droopy & Dripple
episodes.overview: The Fabulous Droopy and Dripple draw crowds, much to the dismay of rival club owner McWolf.

episodes.name: S.O.S. Ninja
episodes.overview: Jerry buys a magic belt that summons Ninja mice to battle his enemies.

episodes.overview: Tyke enters the soapbox derby but ends up piloting the pink power puff racer.

episodes.overview: McWolf tries to poach customers from rival Droopy.

episodes.overview: McWolf is dismayed when Droopy captivates Miss Vavoom on the ski slopes.

episodes.overview: Spike nods off at work after too many hours working.

episodes.name: Catastrophe Cat
episodes.overview: Tom's cousin pays a visit.

episodes.name: Droopy and the Dragon
episodes.overview: McWolf hires a dragon to help with the special effects for his magic show.

episodes.name: Wildmouse II
episodes.overview: A rodent steals the sheriff's dinner.

episodes.name: Tom's Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Tom's double trouble begins when his owner tells him to guard a gift but it's a mouse!

episodes.name: High Seas Hijinks
episodes.overview: Pirate McWolf interferes with explorer Droopy.

episodes.overview: Slowpoke Antonio accidentally enters a bullfight.

episodes.overview: Jerry pesters Tom at a museum.

episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple compete against McWolf in a dog sled race to the North Pole.

episodes.overview: Canadian Mountie Droopy and Dripple must capture notorious outlaw Slalom McWolf.

episodes.overview: A big-game hunter plans to add the cat and mouse to his collection.

episodes.name: I Dream of Cheezy
episodes.overview: A genie helps Jerry battle Tom.

episodes.overview: Tom's brother visits and claims to have conquered his fear of mice.

episodes.name: Sing Along with Slowpoke
episodes.overview: Tom disagrees with Slowpoke's choice of music.

episodes.name: Dakota Droopy and the Great Train Robbery

episodes.overview: Judge Droopy presides over a case involving Dripple and McWolf.

episodes.overview: Tom doubles for star Kevin Catner as a stunt cat.

episodes.name: See No Evil
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry have fun with invisible ink.

episodes.overview: The cast of the Tom and Jerry Kids perform a musical.

episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry create trouble at the circus.

episodes.name: Cajun Gumbo
episodes.overview: Swampy Fox searches for treasure.

episodes.overview: The wealthiest collector in the world offers hunter Pierre a million dollars to capture Wild Mouse.

episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple compete against McWolf.

episodes.overview: Droopy, Dripple and McWolf crash onto an alien planet.

episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry confront an angry giant.

episodes.overview: Droopy and McWolf enter a marathon.

episodes.overview: A snooty woman hires Tom and Calaboose Cal to rid her apartment of Jerry.

episodes.overview: McWolf fights a court case with Droopy presiding and a jury comprised of twelve angry sheep.

episodes.name: The Ant Attack
episodes.overview: Tom's birthday party is interrupted by insects.

episodes.overview: Wartime courier Jerry must fly across enemy lines.

episodes.overview: Droopy's new invention steals attention from McWolf.

episodes.name: Wild World of Bowling
episodes.overview: Wild Mouse wreaks havoc.

episodes.name: Star Wrek
episodes.overview: A space battle unfolds between Captain Quirk and Thomas the Barbarian.

episodes.name: Droop & Deliver
episodes.overview: Bank guards Droopy and Dripple contend with McWolf.

episodes.name: Swallow the Swallow
episodes.overview: A sickly bird crashes in front of two starving cats.

episodes.name: Lightning Bolt-The Super Squirrel-Strikes Again
episodes.overview: A heroic rodent rescues Tom and Jerry.

episodes.name: Surely You Joust
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple confront a dragon.

episodes.name: Rootin' Tootin' Slowpoke
episodes.overview: The Rootin' Tootin' Slowpoke rids the town of desperado Flashypuss.

episodes.name: Firehouse Mouse
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry cause problems at a fire station.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Dark Wolf
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple confront Dark Wolf.

episodes.name: Pound Hound
episodes.overview: Kyle the cat becomes handcuffed to a dog.

episodes.name: The Ghost of Castle McLochjaw
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry help a ghostly dog.

episodes.name: A Thousand Clones
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple confront a thousand clones of the evil Dr. McWolf.

episodes.name: Roughing It
episodes.overview: The Mouse Scouts outwit their captain on a wilderness adventure.

episodes.name: As the Cheese Turns
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry fight over which TV program to watch.

episodes.name: McWerewolf of London
episodes.overview: Investigators Droopy and Dripple thwart the vici ous criminal McWerewolf of London.

episodes.name: Grab That Bird
episodes.overview: Starving Clyde and Kyle attempt to grab that bird.

episodes.name: Cave Mouse
episodes.overview: When a professor tells about the prehistoric times in a university, the cave cat Tom pursues the cave mouse Jerry.

episodes.name: McWolfenstein Returns
episodes.overview: The mad scientist McWolfenstein gets him out of the castle for failure to do so before he meets Droopy, who's spoofing as Alfred Hitchcock, makes him star on his new monster-thriller movie titled "Saturday the 14th" (a take-off with the slasher horror film "Friday the 13th"). When McWolf spotted on television, he tries to stop them and bring his monster back for making the film.

episodes.name: Destructive Construction
episodes.overview: Blast-off Buzzard pursues Crazy Legs Snake at a construction site in attempts to eat the snake, but fails.

episodes.name: Droopy Man
episodes.overview: In a city of darkness known as Gossip City, the millionaires & superheroes Droopy Man and Dripple Boy teams up with Cheetah Vavoom to stop the greedy pig named Piligos P. Snorthog for stealing their foods around the city. The title character is a parody of Batman.

episodes.name: Abusement Park
episodes.overview: Blast-Off Buzard tracks Crazy Legs to an abandoned amusement park, which becomes an abusement park.

episodes.name: Martian Mouse
episodes.overview: The Martian Mouse that was on board the ship was breaking up due to malfunction, so he makes an emergency landing on planet Earth and meets Jerry after Tom gets him out of the house for playing drums while sleeping. While he makes a teleporting back to his planet after tells him to take care of his spaceship, Jerry flies around until Tom accidentally swallows it.

episodes.name: Dark Wolf Strikes Back
episodes.overview: In McDoogles pig farm, the boxing pig escapes the barn at night from being pursuit by the police when he thinks he's going to be shipped to the meat market after they informed him by his fellow pigs before he heads to the suburbs where he meets Jerry for help, while Tom also foils an attempt to sell the pigs for a big money reward when he's informed by watching television before Jerry stops him by using the bell to beats him out.

episodes.name: Knockout Pig
episodes.overview: In a sequel to the season 3 title "The Wrath of Dark Wolf" after they captured Dark Wolf and teleported him to the Planet "Hoodnik," Captain Droopy and Junior Captain Dripple was sent out to find the priceless abadon energy ball and bring them back to Starleash Headquarters who has stolen by the galactic bandence and separated into two pieces were hidden by other planets when Dark Wolf returns to the action and attempts to steal their pieces too.

episodes.name: Musketeer Jr.
episodes.overview: A musketeer Jerry teaches Tuffy how to be a musketeer in his fencing school and fight against the musketeer Tom for getting rid of them when Tuffy exclaims "Touch√©, Pussy Cat!" and pokes Tom's rear-end four times in the process.

episodes.name: Galaxy Droopy
episodes.overview: The third episode is about a Dark Wolf's invention with the new Super Sucksaforus vacuum which can inhale all and suck out their planets before he tries to steal a bunch of lottery tickets at the convenience store, Captain Droopy and Junior Captain Dripple were on the mission to stop him from his evil plans.

episodes.name: Droopy Man Returns
episodes.overview: Deep in a heart of Gossip City, Droopy Man and Dripple Boy returns to the action to stop the mad scientist Dr. Reginald Riff Rat (a guest star voiced by Mark Hamill) for plans to turn the city onto the rats just like him and also tries to kidnap Cheetah Vavoom.

episodes.name: Tom Thumped
episodes.overview: The Wildmouse was escaped from the Dingo Brothers Circus coming this weekend is being informed by Jerry's watching television when the police are searching and try to arrest him for chewing up his shoes where he meets Jerry in hideout before he helps him to get some food for the cat hungry, but is being chased by Tom to meet the white cat next door.

episodes.name: Droopnet
episodes.overview: In the city on Friday night, Detective cop Droopy and Rookie Dripple are searching for the notorious car thief named Scofflaw Badwrench. This episode is a parody of the 1987 American buddy cop comedy film "Dragnet".

episodes.name: Right Brother Droopy
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple are the Right Brothers, and they compete with the airplane invention contest when the reporter Miss Scoops Vavoom comes by for them to be in the contest and win up to $20,000, while Flip-Flop McWolf (who is also the paperboy) also wants to participate as well to fly against them in the contest. This episode is a parody of the "Wright Brothers".

episodes.name: Cheap Skates
episodes.overview: During a chase, the television tells Jerry can order the roller skates named Zip-Zip Roller Wheels which makes faster than the spacecraft so can be use it to mess up with him. And later, the television are also tells Tom to buy the same skates to chase around the house and the outside.

episodes.name: Hollywood Droopy
episodes.overview: Out in the Hollywood, the washed-up producer and the owner of a Dilapidated Pictures Flops McWolf sees Droopy and Dripple as the stars of the new movie. They signed the contract (which was really an accident insurance policy) naming him benefactor so he can receive all the money if they have any accidents, but all the "accidents" while he tries to filming them only happens to him.

episodes.name: Fallen Archers
episodes.overview: In medieval times, Droopy and Dripple compete with the Father & Son Archery Contest against McWolf and his son Stinky, the winner of the contest will receive the romantic dinner date with the magic sand of the love angel Miss Vavoom.

episodes.name: When Knights Were Cold
episodes.overview: Since the knights are too cowardly to face the fire-breathing Wildmouse, Tom is sent by the king to deal with the fire-breathing fiend, but fails to capturing him.

episodes.name: The Mouth Is Quicker Than the Eye
episodes.overview: Cal the Magnificent (Calaboose Cal) and the Mystery Lady (Miss Vavoom) helps her to do some more magicians to deal against the naughty boy named Bratty in his child's birthday party.

episodes.name: Mutton for Punishment
episodes.overview: Evil cattle baron Sidewinder McWolf theatens Dripple the sheepherder.

episodes.name: Cat Counselor Cal
episodes.overview: Cat Counselor Cal counsels Tom on the problem of eliminating Jerry.

episodes.name: Termite Terminator
episodes.overview: A snooty society matron summons Calaboose Cal, the Termite Terminator.

episodes.name: El Smoocho
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple are driving the coach in full of gold shipment with Miss Lily Vavoom to Dodge City, they come across the paths of El Smoocho (McWolf) who attempts to take her and tries to steal the gold off for himself.

episodes.name: Droopy Hockey
episodes.overview: Slapstick Droopy competes in a wild game against Ice Pick McWolf.

episodes.name: Hawkeye Tom
episodes.overview: Both Hawkeye Tom and a bird try to capture Jerry.

episodes.name: No Tom Like the Present
episodes.overview: Tom's on his best behavior when he learns he only has one of his nine lives left.

episodes.name: Dirty Droopy
episodes.overview: Dirty Droopy relentlessly pursues criminal Mangler McWolf.

episodes.name: Two Stepping Tom
episodes.overview: Two-Stepping Tom is hired to remove Jerry from a concert hall where a mice-shy elephant is performing.

episodes.name: Disc Temper
episodes.overview: Tom discovers a guard dog can't resist chasing Frisbees.

episodes.name: Order in Volleyball Court
episodes.overview: Droopy and Dripple compete in a wacky volleyball game against McWolf and Stinky.

episodes.name: King Wild Mouse - 10th Wonder of the World
episodes.overview: Tom finally captures King Wild Mouse.

episodes.name: Space Chase
episodes.overview: A scientist sends Tom and Jerry into space to determine if natural enemies can peacefully coexist.
